techmeme.title: Sources: the EU Commission and four member nations plan a probe into Shein over illegal products, opening the fast fashion marketplace up to potential fines (Bloomberg)

Analysis: Meta has invested $80B+ in AR and VR since 2014 when it bought Oculus, and is on track to top $100B in 2025; a source says it sold 1M Ray-Bans in 2024 (Financial Times)
An analysis of FEC filings shows Elon Musk spent $288M+ to elect Trump and other Republicans, the 2024 election's biggest donor; Musk's America PAC raised $263M (Washington Post)
